title: Incredible Uptown Studio! Full Amenities!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Call Apartment Guys to 773-549-3474  and ask for reference #2201343. This gorgeous studio is modern and new! LARGE LAYOUT! Amazing view and space High Rise building! This apartment also has floor to ceiling windows, an incredible amount of natural light, large walk-in closets and a modern kitchen with a dishwasher. Also, it has central air conditioning! Some of the features of the building:  FITNESS center, outdoor swimming POOL, dry cleaners, GRILL area, dog walk area, party room and doorman, high speed Wifi common area . Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2201343
